message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started with a 50/50 offer, so I'll try to get a bit more
You're trying to get too much, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too greedy!
You're trying to get too little, Alice! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any younger!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to give away the farm!
I'm not getting any younger, and I need a decent share. Let's meet in the middle... sort of.
You're really pushing your luck, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm going to roll over and play dead!
